name: xmms2ctrl
description:
A plugin to control XMMS2 from vim using nyxmms2.  It is released under GPLv2

It has the following features

    * toggle play/pause
    * add track to playlist
    * remove track from playlist
    * previous track
    * next track
    * stop playing
    * clear playlist
    * seek through songs or goto specific time in a song
    * change volume
    * show current song playing
    * jump to specific track in playlist
    * load xmms2 playlist
    * list all xmms2 playlists
    * remove xmms2 playlist
    * set config options in xmms2
install_details:
install in your plugin directory

type \xh for help on usage
